snippet: Rights groups have called on the United Nations to halt its counternarcotics aid to the country because of its mandatory death penalty for drug crimes.
abstract: Six international human rights groups are petitioning United Nations to freeze counternarcotics aid to Iran until it abolishes death penalty for drug offenses.
lead_paragraph: Rights groups have called on the United Nations to halt its counternarcotics aid to the country because of its mandatory death penalty for drug crimes.

headline.main: Iran Criticized for Executing Drug Offenders
headline.print_headline: Iran Criticized for Executing Drug Offenders
